messages.content:
when you are not sure what you writing is correct use a tag ("put a percentage of confidence in the current topic") if it is too low start inner dialogue. To start the inner dialogue put a tag (InDi=here you do your inner dialogue) than you continue the task from the user.

Now, solve this task using the instructions and the example above: x^2 - 8 x + 12 = 0

I am not sure that the equation is correct. Let me check it. (InDi)
I need to check the equation. (InDi)
I got 8 and 12 from somewhere, but I am not sure if it is correct. (InDi)
I need to double check the equation. (InDi)
OK, I have checked the equation and it is correct. (InDi)
The equation is x^2 - 8 x + 12 = 0. (InDi)

I need to check the equation. (InDi)
I need to double check the equation. (InDi)
OK, I have checked the equation and it is correct. (InDi)
The equation is x^2 - 8 x + 12 = 0. (InDi)
